name: Mindfulness Meditation
description: Focus on breathing or present sensations without judgment. Notice thoughts and feelings as they arise, then let them go.

name: Loving-kindness Meditation (Metta)
description: Cultivate feelings of love and compassion towards oneself and others. Repeat phrases like 'May I be happy, may I be healthy, may I be safe, may I live with ease.'

name: Body Scan Meditation
description: Focus on each part of the body sequentially, bringing awareness and relaxation to tense areas.

name: Breath Awareness Meditation
description: Focus solely on the breathâ€”observe the inhalation and exhalation to anchor the mind and calm thoughts.

name: Visualization Meditation
description: Imagine positive outcomes or serene environments. Visualize goals and aspirations to boost confidence and motivation.

name: Walking Meditation
description: Slow, deliberate walking while maintaining awareness of each step and sensations. Can be grounding and calming.

name: Mantra Meditation
description: Repeat a calming word or phrase silently. Focus on the rhythm and sound to quiet the mind.

name: Transcendental Meditation (TM)
description: Use a specific mantra assigned by a teacher. Practice twice daily for 20 minutes to promote deep relaxation and improve sleep.

name: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
description: Tense and relax muscle groups progressively, starting from the toes up to the head. Helps release physical tension and calm the mind.

name: Soothing Sound Meditation
description: Focus on calming sounds like nature, white noise, or calming music to improve focus and reduce irritability.
